Today, Pembrokeshire is lighting up with 6 ft @8s SW swell and fresh 15 mph S winds. Good spots like Abereiddy and Whitesands Bay are working well, especially on the mid-tide push. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 5 ft @12s WSW with fresh 19 mph S winds, making it less favorable across the board. By the day after, the swell eases to 2 ft @10s WSW with light 4 mph E winds, offering a cleaner, more enjoyable session. Best: today.
